price: Ɔsoro ne asaase ne deε εwͻ ne mmienu mfimfii Wura, ne apueε ahodoᴐ no Wura .
arabic: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ ٱلۡمَشَٰرِقِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: rabbu al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā warabbu al-mashāriqi
